title: 88 - Live at the Comedy Theatre
description: This week’s My Favorite Murder comes to you live from the Comedy Theatre. On stage, Karen and Georgia cover serial killers Ivan Milat and The Brownout Strangler.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
